_description.value:
-- Two public or private sections are declared for the same package. Bug SC0002.

PACKAGE pack
PUBLIC -- bug SC0002    

  THREAD myThr

  END myThr;


END pack;

-- second public section declaration of the package
PACKAGE pack
PUBLIC -- bug SC0002

  THREAD myThr2

  END myThr2;


PRIVATE -- bug SC0002    

  THREAD myThr3

  END myThr3;


END pack;

PACKAGE pack2
PUBLIC -- bug SC0002

  THREAD myThr4

  END myThr4;


PRIVATE -- bug SC0002    

  THREAD myThr5

  END myThr5;


END pack2;

-- second private package declaration of the package
PACKAGE pack
PRIVATE -- bug SC0002    

  THREAD myThr6

  END myThr6;


END pack;

PACKAGE pack2
PUBLIC -- bug SC0002

  THREAD myThr7

  END myThr7;


PRIVATE -- bug SC0002    

  THREAD myThr8

  END myThr8;


END pack2;
